text: <@U0309HYFAGY> It's already been resolved, I added the react app in the wrong place. Thank you for your interest and willingness to help :)
Is there a ideal way to implement a form into the boilerplate if I let a user select a form from a field?

If you copy snippet on the form field in the design manager  it will give you an example of how to embed that form into your module.

Thereâ€™s nothing specific to the boilerplate about it.
